content.description: From a sit start, follow the thin right-angling crack to the mini-shelf, then head to the top following another thin crack/seam.Problem #222 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
content.location: After going up the scrambling section, head right, pass the pine and this will be the next boulder over, on the north face (head through gap between the boulders on right side).

content.description: In between the boulders, climb the overhanging face avoiding the other boulders.Problem #219 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
content.location: After going up the scrambling section, head right, pass the pine and this will be the next boulder over, on the east face between the boulders.

content.description: From a sit start, climb the face just right of the chunky foothold. A couple harder moves, then tapers off quick.Problem #218 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
